divs: Sighting DetailsI think I saw the next generation stealth bomber. I was working at the time as a Registered Nurse at Desert Regional Medical Center in Palm Springs on the night shift a few years back. I wasn't supposed to be on the balcony of the East Tower as the doors have been locked because of fire code reasons. Anyway, I was standing out there getting some freash air in the middle of the night when I saw what appeared to be a "wedge" shape with red lights down the side fly quickly and quietly down Palm Canyon Drive, the main strip in PS. I heard nothing and it only lasted a brief moment. There is an air museum in PS and for the Veterans Day parade they fly vintage bombers down the same route, and this object was a little smaller than those that I had seen. I came inside and told the other nurse that I saw a "UFO" but I think that it was the next generation stealth. Her husband is into this stuff and she knew exactly what I was talking about. Anyway, I had a few moments and was trying to find any information available on this object, which I know I have seen on TV before describing just what I saw. Any information you have would be helpful. Thank you.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Palm Springs
There were no other sightings in Palm Springs on or around July 31st 2002
